main_definition: Fish is a term that can refer to aquatic vertebrates, an idiom implying difficulty or failure in accomplishing something, as well as various other meanings including food and sports equipment.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Aquatic vertebrate animals with gills that live in water
meanings_and_examples.example: Tuna fish swim fast to catch their prey.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiom used when someone fails or has difficulty accomplishing something
meanings_and_examples.example: I can't believe I still haven't figured out how to use this new software; it really is fish!

meanings_and_examples.definition: A type of food, especially one served as part of a meal
meanings_and_examples.example: The restaurant specializes in fresh salmon and grilled trout.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Equipment used for catching fish or swimming
meanings_and_examples.example: He put on his wetsuit, grabbed his fishing rod, and headed to the lake.
